name: jiggly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
moving from side to side or up and down with quick short movements, or able to do this: People are always complaining about that jiggly stuff around their middle known as belly fat. The cheesecake may still be jiggly, like jelly.
More examplesFewer examplesHe's not a fan of the film's jiggly camera style.When something gets hot then it changes. Its molecules get all jiggly.Every January, people resolve to lose their spare tyres, love handles, and other jiggly bits.
